description: Try our easy to follow Tomato Tzatziki Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Low fat,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Tomato Tzatziki Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Lebanese cucumber, halved lengthways, thickly sliced
0.5 bunch red radishes, cut into matchsticks

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Tear bread into large pieces and place on tray. Spray with oil and sprinkle with paprika. Bake for 810 minutes or until crisp. Set aside to cool.
Meanwhile, transfer tzatziki dip to a small bowl. Add lemon juice and oil and stir well.
Toss together tomato, cucumber, radish, spinach and toasted bread in a large bowl. Season with ground black pepper. Garnish with dill. Serve with the tzatziki to drizzle over.
